steps.title: Your appointment has been booked!
steps.text: We will ask a couple of pre-visit questions in order to better understand the situation and provide more effective STI prevention and intervention from the national level in the future. Remember, we value your privacy seriously, any personal information that you have provided is confidential.

steps.title: Preferred phone number to receive appointment updates and test results
What is the main reason you chose this clinic for care?

textChoices.text: Could walk in or get same day appointment
textChoices.value: Could walk in or get same day appointment

textChoices.text: Have doctors that speak my language or share race/ethnicity
textChoices.value: Have doctors that speak my language or share race/ethnicity

steps.title: Do you have health insurance (choose only one)?

textChoices.text: Yes, private insurance (purchased by yourself/healthcare.gov exchange)
textChoices.value: Yes, private insurance (purchased by yourself/healthcare.gov exchange)

steps.title: Would you be willing to use your health insurance for this visit?
If No, why not (choose all that apply)?

textChoices.text: I do not want my insurance company to know
textChoices.value: I do not want my insurance company to know

textChoices.value: Insurance company might send records home

textChoices.value: I do not want my parents/spouse/significant other to know

textChoices.text: Discharge/drip/abnormal blood spotting from vagina, penis or anus
textChoices.value: Discharge/drip/abnormal blood spotting from vagina, penis or anus

textChoices.text: Sore(s) or a rash on penis, vagina or anus or body
textChoices.value: Sore(s) or a rash on penis, vagina or anus or body

textChoices.text: Pain/discomfort in lower tummy, anus or genital area?

steps.title: When was your last STI check?

textChoices.value: Discharge/drip/abnormal blood spotting from vagina, penis or anus

steps.title: Number of partners since your last STI check
Has a sexual partner told you they have a sexually transmitted infection (STI)?
Do you use condoms with casual partners?
Are you taking PrEP (HIV prevention drug)?
Have you ever given oral sex?
Have you ever received anal sex?

steps.text: Have you ever used needles to inject drugs or had a tattoo from an unlicensed source?
Has a previous partner ever injected drugs or had a tattoo from an unlicensed source?
Have you ever had a sexual encounter against your wishes or sexual abuse?
If you have answered yes, would you like us to contact you to provide support?
Thanks for taking the survey, we will contact you soon!
steps.title: Done!
